body:
To launch a campaign, log into your AdRoll dashboard. Make sure that your SmartPixel is active.

Create new campaign

To get started, click the “Create New Campaign” in the right sidebar. 

Step 1: Choose whether you want to retarget your visitors web or Facebook. 

  • The web is good for reach: we serve your ads everywhere your visitors go, not just Facebook. 
  • Facebook is good for social engagement: visitors can like, comment, and share your post with their network. 

Step 2: Basic campaign settings 

  • Budget: The amount you want to spend each week on retargeting. You’ll need to budget at least $25. 
  • Schedule: If you do not adjust this, your campaign is set to start immediate with no firm end date (you can specify an end date later by editing your campaign). Your campaign run time should be at least 2 weeks. 
  • Start Date: When you want your campaign to start serving 
  • End Date: When you want your campaign to end 
  • Geotargets: If someone goes to your website, that suggests already that they’re a potential customer. That being said, geotargets can be set to include or exclude specific locales.  

Step 3: Who should see your ads? 

  • If you are running a general brand campaign or just getting started, select All Visitors. 

Step 4: What ads should we deliver? 

  • If you would like for our Design Squad to design custom ads for you, click "Request Ads".
  • To upload your own ads, drag and drop your files or browse for them. 

Step 5: Payment and review 

  • You must enter a CC or link PayPal to launch your campaign. If you have promotional credit to cover your weekly campaign budget, you will not be charged when your campaign is approved to run.
